Package io.sf.carte.doc.style.css

Interface StyleFormattingContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultStyleFormattingContext, InlineStyleFormattingContext
public interface StyleFormattingContext
Define methods for style text formatting.

Different implementations of this interface can provide different style text formattings.

See Also:
StyleFormattingFactory, CSSStyleSheetFactory.setStyleFormattingFactory(StyleFormattingFactory)

    • writeValue

      void writeValue​(SimpleWriter wri, java.lang.String propertyName, ExtendedCSSValue value) throws java.io.IOException
      Write a css value to the given writer.
      Parameters:
      wri - the writer.
      propertyName - the name of the property whose value is being printed.
      value - the value to write.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an error happened while writing.

    • writeShorthandValue

      void writeShorthandValue​(SimpleWriter wri, java.lang.String shorthandName, CSSShorthandValue value) throws java.io.IOException
      Serialize a css shorthand value to the given writer.

      Although the CSSShorthandValue type contains priority information, this method only writes the value.

      Parameters:
      wri - the writer.
      shorthandName - the name of the shorthand property whose value is being printed.
      value - the value to write.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an error happened while writing.
